Okay no problem, will figure something out on my own. Thanks!

title: Add dynamic file extension input feature
body:
- Introduced an input box and add button to allow users to add custom file extensions.
- Ensured extensions can be added with or without a leading dot (e.g., "rs" or ".rs").
- Displayed a list of added extensions with the ability to remove them.

Basically allows you to add to the common file extensions list.
author: OohBen

comments.body: Awesome stuff! But I envisioned it a bit differently.
